name: hkdfDerivedSymmetricKey(using:salt:sharedInfo:outputByteCount:)
desc: Derives a symmetric encryption key from the secret using HKDF key derivation.
declaration: func hkdfDerivedSymmetricKey<H, Salt, SI>(using hashFunction: H.Type, salt: Salt, sharedInfo: SI, outputByteCount: Int) -> SymmetricKey where H : HashFunction, Salt : DataProtocol, SI : DataProtocol
